quotes.quote: I Miss You So Much, It Hurts Sometimes.
quotes.author: John Michael Dorian

quotes.quote: I Shouldn't Be Mopping Here Anyways...This Is A Rug.
quotes.author: Janitor

quotes.quote: Ladies and gentlemen, allow me to present, Man Not Caring.
quotes.author: Dr. Cox

quotes.quote: You Would Hear Cricket's Chirping, But They Were Too Uncomfortable About Just How Unfunny That Actually Was.
quotes.author: Dr. Cox
